description: Detects suspicious ways to download files or content and execute them using PowerShell
false_positives: Scripts or tools that download files and execute them
name: PowerShell Web Download and Execution
query: (process.command_line.text:(*.DownloadString\(* OR *.DownloadFile\(* OR *Invoke\-WebRequest\ *) AND process.command_line.text:(*IEX\(* OR *IEX\ \(* OR *I`EX* OR *IE`X* OR *I`E`X* OR *|\ IEX* OR *|IEX\ * OR *Invoke\-Execution* OR *;iex\ $*))
author: Florian Roth
